QuestData.Title: Huln's War - The Arrival
QuestData.Description:
Huln Highmountain is the origin of our strength as a tribe. He bested the Legion when last they threatened our survival and unified many disparate tribes.
Live his story, and you will know why his name imbues courage in the cowardly and sows fear in the fearless.
QuestData.RewardText: [In broken Common] Feathered one said you come. Unng Ak not hope for you come. Tauren have thanks.

Objectives.Objective: Ask Ebonhorn to Tell You the Story of Huln
